snippet.title: Official Gameplay Reveal | Splitgate 2
snippet.description:
Watch Splitgate 2 live for the first time. August 14 @ 12PM PT / 3PM ET.
https://www.twitch.tv/Splitgate 

In Splitgate 2, each faction has its own strengths and playstyle, which players are free to explore and discover. Switch between factions, mix and match factions when you team up with your friends, and find the one that fits how you want to frag.

Aeros. Sabrask. Meridian. Which faction are you? Take the quiz in the free Splitgate 2 Companion App and find out today.
https://onelink.to/sg2faction

Play together. Stand alone.
https://Splitgate.com

#splitgate2 

Follow us:
https://twitter.com/Splitgate
https://instagram.com/splitgate
https://www.tiktok.com/@splitgate
https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Splitgate
https://discord.gg/splitgate
